step1.heading: Build your job-winning resume in three simple steps
step1.title: Step 01
step1.description: You are given the liberty to choose a template
step1.content: Choose from thousands of professionally designed templates! No matter who you are, our Resume Builder will automatically format them onto your favorite resume templates.

step2.title: Step 02
step2.description: Fill in your details using our simple form
step2.content: We guide you through the process of writing each section, step-by-step, down to the smallest part. Our resume builder does all of the hard work. Remember, your work experiences and education are unique. Our online Resume Builder features will help you create a resume that reflects your greatest strengths.

step3.title: Step 03
step3.description: Download and start applying for jobs today
step3.content: Create, save, and download your resume to apply for any job position in any organization. Our resume generator will make sure the layout stays intact. You can download your resume in PDF any time you desire. Make and download your resume with no compromises.
